_metadata.description: Privacy-first menstrual health tracking requirements registry

requirements.title: Secure multi-tenant period cycle tracking with encrypted local storage
requirements.description: Implements AES-256 encrypted storage in PostgreSQL with multi-tenant isolation for household privacy

validation.notes: Tests encryption/decryption of sensitive health data
Validates tenant isolation at database level

requirements.title: Basic symptom logging (flow, pain, mood, physical symptoms)
requirements.description: Provides API endpoints and UI for logging daily symptoms with validation and storage

validation.notes: Tests symptom CRUD operations and validation
UI component for daily symptom entry

requirements.title: Cycle prediction algorithm with pattern recognition
requirements.description: Statistical prediction algorithm using historical cycle data to forecast next period dates

validation.notes: Tests prediction accuracy with synthetic datasets
Validates predictions update on new cycle data

requirements.title: Calendar integration for period predictions and blocking
requirements.description: Publishes period prediction events for calendar scenario consumption and blocking

validation.notes: Tests event publishing for period.prediction.updated
Manual verification of calendar blocking workflow

requirements.title: Privacy-first architecture with no external data sharing
requirements.description: Ensures all data stays local, no external API calls, audit logging for data access

validation.notes: Verifies no external network calls in core operations
External security review of data handling

requirements.title: Simple, intuitive UI optimized for daily use
requirements.description: Mobile-first responsive UI with quick entry flows and clear data visualization

validation.notes: Daily use flow takes < 30 seconds for symptom logging
Accessibility validation per UX requirements

requirements.title: AI-powered pattern recognition using local Ollama models
requirements.description: Integrates with local Ollama for natural language insights from cycle patterns

validation.notes: Tests Ollama API integration with fallback to statistical analysis

requirements.title: Symptom correlation insights
requirements.description: Detects and surfaces correlations between symptoms and cycle phases

validation.notes: Statistical correlation detection algorithm

requirements.title: Medication and supplement reminder system
requirements.description: Scheduled notifications for medications and supplements based on cycle phase

validation.notes: Tests reminder scheduling and notification delivery

requirements.title: Export functionality for medical appointments
requirements.description: Generates PDF/CSV summaries of cycle history for healthcare provider visits

validation.notes: Tests export format generation

requirements.title: Partner dashboard with consensual, discrete sharing
requirements.description: Opt-in sharing interface for partners/family with granular privacy controls

validation.notes: Partner UI with consent management

requirements.title: Historical trend analysis and reporting
requirements.description: Visualizations and reports showing cycle trends over time

validation.notes: Trend visualization components

requirements.title: Photo tracking for skin/symptom changes
requirements.description: Encrypted photo storage for visual symptom tracking over time

validation.notes: Tests encrypted photo upload and retrieval

requirements.title: Integration with fitness/mood tracking scenarios
requirements.description: Cross-scenario event consumption for holistic health correlations

validation.notes: Tests event consumption from fitness/mood scenarios

requirements.title: Custom reminder scheduling
requirements.description: User-defined reminder schedules beyond medication tracking

validation.notes: Custom reminder UI and scheduling logic

requirements.title: Advanced fertility window calculations
requirements.description: Enhanced prediction algorithms for fertility tracking

validation.notes: Tests fertility window calculation accuracy

requirements.title: Research contribution opt-in with anonymization
requirements.description: Anonymized data export for women's health research with explicit consent

validation.notes: Tests PII removal and data anonymization
Legal review of consent and anonymization process
